channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Content Navigator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Content Navigator

item.title: CVE-2022-43581|2024-08-03T13:32:59.823Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 3.0.0, 3.0.1, 3.0.2, 3.0.3, 3.0.4, 3.0.5, 3.0.6, 3.0.7, 3.0.8, 3.0.9, 3.0.10, 3.0.11, and 3.0.12 is vulnerable to missing authorization and could allow an authenticated user to load external plugins and execute code. IBM X-Force ID: 238805.
